text: Trésor Ndikumana (born 25 April 1998) is a Burundian international footballer who plays as a midfielder for Kenyan Premier League side AFC Leopards and the Burundi national football team. ==International career== Ndikumana made his senior international debut in a 7–0 friendly victory over Djibouti, scoring two goals. == International statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
